titles.title: To amend the Idaho Admission Act regarding the sale or lease of school land.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 400.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-705.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 644.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
By Senator Murkowski from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 105-393.

bill.summary: 6/25/1998--Introduced. Amends the Idaho Admission Act regarding school land lease or sale to provide for: (1) establishment of an earnings reserve fund; (2) authorization of a land bank fund for additional land purchases; and (3) elimination of land lease-time restrictions.
